issue.title: [Java/Python] Add unit test for pyarrow.timeX types in Array.from_jvm
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2605](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2605). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Follow-up after https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2249 as we are missing the necessary methods to construct these arrays conveniently on the Python side.

Once there is a path to construct `pyarrow.Array` instances from a Python list of `datetime.time` for the various time types, we should activate the time types on `test_jvm_array` and ensure that we load them correctly from Java into Python.
